name: Cypress-Automation-Framework-AutomationExercise-E2E-Testing
description: Complete Cypress end-to-end UI test automation for AutomationExercise.com. Covers real-world flows like signup, login, cart, checkout, and more using reusable tests, fixtures, and custom commands. Ideal for QA Engineers and SDETs to learn, practice, or showcase Cypress skills.
author: Karthik Puttoju
